author: kayyagari
msg: o fixed a bug related to setting a method level DirectoryService in a class or suite level LdapServer instance
o added a test case for the fix

author: rickmcguire
msg: GERONIMO-5133 Geroinimo versions of the specs should pick up the additions made to the service mix versions of the bundles.
updates for ejb, persistence, jacc, and jaspic.

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Convert String collections to native string vectors in the JNI
code, eliminating the need to do so in the SVNClient Java class.
[ in subversion/bindings/javahl/ ]
* native/StringArray.h,
native/StringArray.cpp
(StringArray): New constructor which takes a collection of strings.
(~StringArray): Properly destroy the referenced collection.
* native/org_apache_subversion_javahl_SVNClient.cpp
(Java_org_apache_subversion_javahl_SVNClient_getChangelists):
Update function parameter list.
* src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/SVNClient.java
(getChangelists): Remove wrapper around the native method, since the native
version can now handle String collections.

author: julianfoad
msg: Speed up input stream processing in config parser and others that read
single bytes from a stream.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/subst.c
(translated_stream_read): Add an optimized code path for single byte read
requests.
Patch by: Stefan Fuhrmann <stefanfuhrmann{_AT_}alice-dsl.de>

msg: Update actual site with changes I made last week.
